name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForCoagulopathies
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Coagulopathies
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to coagulopathies and is listed as a blood disorder/hemoglobinopathy on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes acquired coagulopathies (e.g., Thrombocytopenia) and inherited coagulopathies (e.g., Von Willebrand's disease).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes neonatal, pregnancy related, neoplasm related or anticoagulant overdose induced coagulopathies.)
